unnamed:Abyss.DESCRIPTION: Fetch a card NL from your Void. NL Lose !M! HP.
unnamed:Abyss.NAME: Abyss

unnamed:Accelerate.NAME: Accelerate
unnamed:Accelerate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Echo. NL Draw your next !M! NL [#EFC851]0-Cost[] cards.

unnamed:Ascent.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Refill your Energy. NL Purge.
unnamed:Ascent.NAME: Ascent

unnamed:Banshee.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.
unnamed:Banshee.NAME: Banshee

unnamed:BlindingLight.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Fate: If you played no [#EFC851]Skills[] last turn, draw this card.
unnamed:BlindingLight.NAME: Blinding Light

unnamed:Devastation.DESCRIPTION: Purge 8 cards from your Void. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.
unnamed:Devastation.NAME: Devastation

unnamed:Dimension.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust a random Voidbound card in your draw pile.
unnamed:Dimension.NAME: Dimension

unnamed:Glass.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 Sound_Wave to your hand.
unnamed:Glass.NAME: Glass
unnamed:Glass.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Echo. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 Sound_Wave to your hand.

unnamed:Infection.DESCRIPTION: Whenever the enemy NL receives a Debuff, NL apply 1 Poison.
unnamed:Infection.NAME: Infection

unnamed:Noise.DESCRIPTION: Echo. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
unnamed:Noise.NAME: Noise

unnamed:Reactor.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw NL a card with Echo, NL gain !M! Block.
unnamed:Reactor.NAME: Reactor

unnamed:Reaper.DESCRIPTION: Kill ALL enemies with less than !M! HP. This number is increased by 2 for each card in your Void.
unnamed:Reaper.NAME: Reaper

unnamed:Rupture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have at least !M! Force, Stun the enemy. Purge.
unnamed:Rupture.NAME: Rupture

unnamed:Shine.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temp._HP. NL Purge a card in NL your Void.
unnamed:Shine.NAME: Shine

unnamed:StarSystem.DESCRIPTION: At the start of NL each turn, you may Exhaust a card to add 1 Sound_Wave to your hand.
unnamed:StarSystem.NAME: Star System

unnamed:Sun.DESCRIPTION: Purge ALL cards in your Void and gain !M! Temp._HP for each.
unnamed:Sun.NAME: Sun

unnamed:Time.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust every Voidbound card in your hand. Draw that many cards. Exhaust.
unnamed:Time.NAME: Time

unnamed:Visions.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! additional cards each turn. Whenever you take damage, reduce this power by 1.
unnamed:Visions.NAME: Visions
